Code to create trajectory in [ChimeraX](https://www.cgl.ucsf.edu/chimerax/): 

```{bash}
open 6n2y 6n2z 6n30
morph #1,2,3 wrap true
save atp-frames.pdb #4 allCoordsets true
```
